articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Lao Federation of Trade Unions
   Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Lao Federation of Trade Unions.
 It was conveyed to Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Khamla Lolonesy, vice-president of the Lao Federation of Trade Unions who is heading its delegation on a visit to the DPRK, today.

articles.title: Kim Jung Rin Meets Lao Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Jung Rin Meets Lao Delegation
   Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a friendly conversation with the delegation of the Lao Federation of Trade Unions led by its Vice-President Khamla Lolonesy at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday. 
 On hand were Kim Yong Do, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and Phonekham Inthaboualy, councilor of the Lao embassy here.

articles.title: DPRK Football Team Beats Iranian Team
articles.content:
DPRK Football Team Beats Iranian Team
   Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team beat the Iranian team 5:0 in the league match of the AFC under-19 Soccer Championship in India on Oct. 31. The Iranian team trounced the Tajik team 3:1. 
 The championship opened in India on October 29.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Jamaica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Jamaica
   Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il's famous work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was brought out in booklet by the Digital Systems Publishing House of Jamaica on October 23.
 The work, published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998), deals with the five-point policy for great national unity, important guidelines for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.    
 The five-point policy for great national unity laid down in the work calls for achieving the great unity of the nation strictly on the basis of the principle of national independence, uniting under the banner of love for the country and the nation and the reunification of the country, improving the relations between the north and the south, struggling against foreign forces and the traitors to the nation in league with them, developing dialogue and boosting visits, unity and solidarity between compatriots, etc.
